job.title: Principal Full-Stack Data Scientist / Data Engineer
job.description: We are focused on building the largest e-commerce platform in the world. Founded by a team of seasoned ex-Amazon operators, Acquco strategically acquires the best brands and accelerates their growth across Amazon, Walmart, Shopify, and other e-commerce ecosystems. We’ve raised over $160M of institutional capital since our inception in 2020, and are focused on rapidly scaling our portfolio team. In the News: Recently featured on Techcrunch, Crunchbase, Business Insider, Pymnts, Pitchbook The Data & Analytics team at Acquco is responsible for driving the vision and execution of developing data assets and insights central to Acquco’s business and technology strategy. Utilizing proprietary models & datasets, the team will be generating data-driven insights across our investments and operational decision making processes. The team will build the data infrastructure to empower technical analysis and answer critical business questions. Acquco is seeking a Principal Full Stack Data Scientist/Data Engineer to deliver end-to-end data solutions. In addition to training statistical models and building data infrastructure, you’ll be engaging with business divisions to define/scope questions and validate your solutions/answers. You will have the opportunity to work in a dynamic fast-paced environment with exceptional growth potential, learning/working across all business areas, gaining full stack experience, and seeing immediate impact/usage of your data solutions. Responsibilities Engaging with stakeholders to acquire understanding of data-related business needs, gathering technical requirements, proposing implementation plans, and delivering end-to-end data solutions Iteratively delivering data solutions (e.g. data processing pipelines and metrics/reports/models) to meet stakeholder needs; evolving the system to meet emerging requirements and feedback Championing best practices and excellence in data quality and data engineering Proposing data innovations/improvements that improve the effectiveness of the team and/or the value of the business Qualifications Masters or higher degree in computer science, data science, or similar discipline. 8+ years of experience in data sciences and data engineering Experience developing/administering cloud-based data platforms (e.g. cloud data warehouses) Experience developing and deploying statistical models. Experience with cloud computing platforms (preferably AWS) Experience developing/maintaining ETLs Experienced in database systems such as PostgreSQL, including designing relational database schemas, creating/managing views, triggers, stored procedures, functions, user-defined types, etc Strong programming languages: Python, Javascript/Typescript, SQL Experience with CI/CD practices Characteristics Effective at self-prioritizing efforts: recognizing (possibly time-sensitive) cost/benefits of your actions, practicing iterative software development principles (i.e. delivering incremental value,) Effective and proactive communicator, adjusting language to ensure comprehension by (possibly non-technical) teammates, enabling everyone to make informed decisions Capable of overcoming obstacles and finding solutions, including finding/seeking help from internal and external resources Collaborative teammate who thrives within an inclusive culture, working across business divisions with teammates of diverse backgrounds Embodies a growth mindset and a willingness to go into the unknown: ready to learn about new contexts and new technologies, doing what’s needed to help the team succeed
